overview:
Named by Advertising Age as one of the top â€œWomen to Watch” in 2008 and to Multichannel Newsâ€™ “40 Under 40” in 2009, Tara Walpert Levy has been driving rapid growth at Visible World since joining the company in 2005.

As the president of Visible World, she has been responsible in growing the companyâ€™s products and partnerships with the countryâ€™s major cable service providers, television networks and advertising agencies. She has been instrumental in making Visible Worldâ€™s solution the leading advanced video advertising platform and service for television distributors, programmers, media buyers, advertising professionals and marketers.

Prior to joining Visible World, Tara was an Associate Partner at McKinsey & Company, where she was a leader of the Global Media & Entertainment and Sales & Marketing groups. She has also worked as an investment banker for Goldman Sachs and a consultant for The LEK Partnership. Tara began her career in print and online advertising sales and served on the Board of Directors of Letâ€™s Go Publishing, Inc.

Tara currently serves on the alumni advisory board of McKinsey & Company, is a member of the Young Presidents Organization, and serves on the Board of Directors of Project Enterprise, a non-profit offering micro-lending, services, and support to entrepreneurs and small businesses in under-resourced communities. She is also an advisor to several Boston and New York based start-ups including Refinery 29, Choicestream, Inc., and Storage by Mail.

Source: Visible World
